definitions.definition: the tidal mouth of a large river, where the tide meets the stream.
examples: (river) mouth, delta; Morearchaicembouchure, debouchure, debouchment, discharge, disemboguement "we paddled down the estuary, observing herons and ospreys"Moreembouchure, debouchure, debouchment, discharge, disemboguement we paddled down the estuary, observing herons and ospreys
